content:
This section covers various methods for manipulating low-level geometry and vertex information in Panda3D, including dynamic creation of Textures and guidance on reading existing geometry, modifying existing geometry, using memoryviews, mesh drawers, reader-writer-rewriter tools, and writing models to disk.

Other Vertex and Model Manipulation

This section shows some other ways to manipulate low-level geometry and vertex information, including dynamically creating other kinds of Panda3D objects like Textures.
